overview.en: Tellor is a decentralized Oracle for bringing high value off-chain data onto Ethereum. The system utilizes a network of staked miners that compete to solve a PoW challenge to submit the official value for requested data.  Tokens are mined with every successful Tellor data point and the company takes a 10% dev share to support the development of the ecosystem.
overview.zh: Tellor是一个去中心化的Oracle预言机网络平台，用于将高价值的链下数据融入以太坊。该系统利用有争议的矿工网络竞争解决PoW问题，在链上监测用户数据请求，链下监控和接收数据请求。每个成功的Tellor数据点都将使用代币进行开采，该公司拿出10％的开发份额以支持生态系统的发展。
